topic.title: Bucket Protection
topic.shortdesc: Couchbase Server provides bucket security using bucket authentication and removal of unprotected buckets.

body.section:
Bucket Authentication Couchbase Server authenticates buckets using the SASL password.
For more information, see .

Removal of Unprotected BucketsTo safeguard security in the production phase, delete the buckets created by the Couchbase Server as a part of the installation process.
This applies to:
Default bucket, which has no password support.
Any sample buckets supplied with empty passwords.
